title: Archive through June 17, 2003

comments.content:

i showed nevertheless too much ;-)   
   
your are the winner jean francois!

Ok, still impressed why nobody was not more fast than me to answer? Seems so obvious with your last image?   
   
Anyway, lets go on another new one!   
 ![typo3](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012125856im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/11649.gif)
Lowercase a from Arnhem, designed by Fred Smeijers?
no, its a typeface designed by less experienced designers. The answer is not far.
Lowercase a from Wedge by Aaron Sittig?
Don't know this guy? Don't know this Wedge font too. So, its not the right answer.
This is Bertrand?
F
haha! i knew i recognized it!

Yeah, thx JFP!   
   
I leave my challenge : This is very easy, nor presisam of tips!   
   
I leave my challenge to all: This is very easy!   
   
   
 ![Very easy!](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012125856im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/11697.jpg)   
   
Good look

Still impressed by John Hudson proposal! Great compliment for the students!   
   
If you reconized it, Tiffany, who you don't reacted!? afraid?

What's so easy about it?   
We need hints! ;-)

_Steve: Lowercase a from Wedge by Aaron Sittig?   
JPF: Don't know this guy? Don't know this Wedge font too.   
JFP: At least, someone who follow what's happen on Typophile forums! :-)_      
   
I believe the word I'm looking for is: [Touch](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012125856/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/11643.html?1055631740)

Ok Eduardo: This is a very new typeface   
from a much know typefoundry!
looks like Aspect from Jeremy Tankard...
Sorry BJ Harvey, this is not Aspect!

Still have no idea.   
May I ask you when it was released?   
And, is that a "g"?

It "feels" like parisine, but I don't think it is Parisine. I can't figure out which character this is suppose to be.   
   
Left or Right, of the Atlantic??

Eduardo: The little time, one week!   
And, yeah, this is lw "g"   
   
Tiffany: Sorry, this is not Parisine! Big tip:   
The foundry is based in America!

I have see a g too, in early hours, but the top ending sound very odd to me! The only face I know with something similar to that came from Nederland, from DTL. But its not this one!   
   
???? sound difficult until someone came with the right answer!

I have see a g too, in early hours, but the top ending sound very odd to me! The only face I know with something similar to that came from Nederland, from DTL. But its not this one!   
   
???? sound difficult until someone came with the right answer!
the gif is small, but is it Felbridge Italic?
the gif is small, but is it Felbridge Italic?
